body_html:
Sure, just opened the PR (I got what you meant by easily diffed, notebook doesn't play nicely on that aspect... :)).

Though I did not have trouble to download the files (it just took time), I was also a bit scared it would be difficult as my connection is quite erratic sometimes. I don't think there is much to be done, but I would suggest warning the reader about it, and suggesting them to download the file separately if they have a slow / not reliable connection (e.g. with a download manager that support pause/resume).
To help with that, maybe a torrent link could be set up (I didn't check if there is already one).

body:
Sure, just opened the PR (I got what you meant by easily diffed, notebook doesn't play nicely on that aspect... :)).

Though I did not have trouble to download the files (it just took time), I was also a bit scared it would be difficult as my connection is quite erratic sometimes. I don't think there is much to be done, but I would suggest warning the reader about it, and suggesting them to download the file separately if they have a slow / not reliable connection (e.g. with a download manager that support pause/resume). 
To help with that, maybe a torrent link could be set up (I didn't check if there is already one).
